gov.nih.nlm.meme.server
Class ServerToolkit

java.lang.Object
  gov.nih.nlm.swing.SwingToolkit
      gov.nih.nlm.meme.MEMEToolkit
          gov.nih.nlm.meme.server.ServerToolkit
All Implemented Interfaces:
MEMEConstants, SwingConstants
Direct Known Subclasses:
ServerToolkit
public class ServerToolkit
extends MEMEToolkit

Utility class for the MEME Application Server. It contains methods for initializing applications.

Author:
MEME Group

ServerToolkit

Method Detail

initialize

public static void initialize(InitializationContext context)
                       throws InitializationException
Initialize the toolkit. Initialization is primarily done by calling MEMEToolkit.initialize(String[], String[]) with the MAS application specific properties. Additionally, it should create a MEMESchedule object if needed.

Parameters:
context - the InitializationContext
Throws:
InitializationException - if initialization failed.

setKillWithWait

public static void setKillWithWait(boolean kww)
Sets the server toolkit's thread pool reference. This is only called by MEMEApplicationServer.addHook(Initializable)

Parameters:
kww - indicates whether to kill with wait

setThreadPool

public static void setThreadPool(ThreadPool tp)
Sets the server toolkit's thread pool reference. This is only called by MEMEApplicationServer.addHook(Initializable)

Parameters:
tp - the ThreadPool

setDataSourcePool

public static void setDataSourcePool(MIDDataSourcePool dp)
Sets the server toolkit's data source pool reference. This is only called by MEMEApplicationServer.addHook(Initializable)

Parameters:
dp - the MIDDataSourcePool

setMEMESchedule

public static void setMEMESchedule(MEMESchedule sch)
Sets the server toolkit's thread pool reference. This is only called by MEMEApplicationServer.addHook(Initializable)

Parameters:
sch - the MEMESchedule

getMEMESchedule

public static MEMESchedule getMEMESchedule()
Get the MEMESchedule used by the toolkit.

Returns:
the MEMESchedule

getThread

public static Thread getThread(Runnable runnable)
                        throws PoolOverflowException
Returns a Thread from the thread pool. If the ThreadPool is full, this method blocks until a thread is available.

Parameters:
runnable - the Runnable
Returns:
the Thread
Throws:
PoolOverflowException - if data source limit has been reached

getThreadPool

public static ThreadPool getThreadPool()
Returns thread pool.

Returns:
the ThreadPool

getDataSourcePool

public static MIDDataSourcePool getDataSourcePool()
Returns data source pool.

Returns:
the MIDDataSourcePool

waitUntilThreadPoolInactive

public static void waitUntilThreadPoolInactive()
Currently unimplimented. This method will block until the active count in the threadpool returns zero.

newMIDDataSource

public static MIDDataSource newMIDDataSource()
                                      throws ReflectionException,
                                             MidsvcsException,
                                             DataSourceConnectionException,
                                             MissingPropertyException
Creates and returns a new MIDDataSource using the service name from the ServerConstants.MID_SERVICE property.

Returns:
the MIDDataSource
Throws:
ReflectionException - if connection could not be opened
MidsvcsException - if the midsvcs server is not available
DataSourceConnectionException - if cannot establish data source connection
MissingPropertyException - if data is missing in property file

newMIDDataSource

public static MIDDataSource newMIDDataSource(String service,
                                             String user,
                                             String password)
                                      throws ReflectionException,
                                             MidsvcsException,
                                             DataSourceConnectionException,
                                             MissingPropertyException
Creates and returns a new MIDDataSource . If service is "", use MID_SERVICE property. This method belongs in MIDDataSourcePool.

Parameters:
service - the service name (e.g. editing-db).
user - the user
password - the password
Returns:
the MIDDataSource
Throws:
ReflectionException - if connection could not be opened
MidsvcsException - if the midsvcs server is not available
DataSourceConnectionException - if cannot establish data source connection
MissingPropertyException - if data is missing in property file
See Also:
MIDServices

getMIDDataSource

public static MIDDataSource getMIDDataSource()
                                      throws ReflectionException,
                                             MidsvcsException,
                                             DataSourceConnectionException,
                                             MissingPropertyException,
                                             PoolOverflowException
This method returns a new MIDDataSource.

Returns:
the MIDDataSource
Throws:
ReflectionException - if connection could not be opened.
MidsvcsException - if the midsvcs server is not available.
DataSourceConnectionException - if cannot establish data source connection.
MissingPropertyException - if data is missing in property file.
PoolOverflowException - if data source limit has been reached.

getMIDDataSource

public static MIDDataSource getMIDDataSource(String service,
                                             String user,
                                             String pwd)
                                      throws ReflectionException,
                                             MidsvcsException,
                                             DataSourceConnectionException,
                                             MissingPropertyException,
                                             PoolOverflowException
This method returns a new MIDDataSource.

Parameters:
service - the service name
user - the user
pwd - the password
Returns:
the MIDDataSource
Throws:
ReflectionException - if connection could not be opened
MidsvcsException - if the midsvcs server is not available
DataSourceConnectionException - if cannot establish data source connection
MissingPropertyException - if data is missing in property file
PoolOverflowException - if data source limit has been reached

returnDataSource

public static void returnDataSource(MEMEDataSource ds)
                             throws BadValueException
Takes a data source object and either returns it to the object MIDDataSourcePool or closes it if it cannot be returned. This method is used by applications that want to discard data source objects that are no longer being used

Parameters:
ds - the MEMEDataSource
Throws:
BadValueException - if failed due to invalid data value
